I need a black Adidas T-shirt. Please buy one if its rating is higher than 4.5.

{"adidas Men's Essentials Feel Ready Training T-Shirt": {'price': 18.75, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P029', 'rating': 4.6, 'reviews': ['Really nice color and fabric, soft and breathable.', 'Super comfortable and breathable shirt. Would buy again.', 'This is a great training tee. I really liked how it feels and the materials are pretty well made. Very comfortable to wear.', 'This shirt is green. I do not think it is moisture wicking.', 'I love white shirts because I can wear it with any color of my track suits.', 'Quality made products. The t-shirts go with anything and are ready for any situation.', 'I was a little bit worried about how durable would be the material but so far no complaints.']}, "Boys' Stay Dry Climalite Short Sleeve T-Shirt": {'price': 13.3, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P031', 'rating': 4.7, 'reviews': ['Super comfortable material, fit is true to size (see size chart and trust it). Loose fit. You have to pay attention to what type of shirt you are buying for sportswear. This is loose fit, not meant to be tight. Holds up after multiple washes, great value for the price. I re-buy every time one in a different color is available. The polyester mix material is great for people with sensitive skin. It is also light weight and breathable for hot days.', 'Excellent t-shirt from [Brand Name]! The cotton quality is superior, very soft to the touch, and the fit is perfect; neither too loose nor too tight. The color remains intact after several washes. Highly recommended!', 'Chego 5 dias antes material e o que vende está perfeita.', 'Well made. Fits true to size. Good color and quality. Comfortable and light weight. Washes well.']}}
